action.text: SA 3836 fell when the motion to concur in the House amendment to S. 1301 with an amendment (SA 3835) tabled.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 3836 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 3835. (consideration: CR S6832; text: CR S6832) To modify the effective date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3836 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 3835.
